scripts.copy: export VERSION=$(cat info.json | jq -r .version) && rsync -r --exclude node_modules $PWD/ ~/Library/Application\ Support/factorio/mods/THPR_$VERSION/
scripts.prebuild: rm -rf build && export VERSION=$(cat info.json | jq -r .version) && mkdir -p build/THPR_$VERSION
scripts.bundle: export VERSION=$(cat info.json | jq -r .version) && cp -r *.lua info.json graphics locale prototypes build/THPR_$VERSION && cd build && zip -r THPR_$VERSION.zip THPR_$VERSION
scripts.deploy: rm -rf ~/Library/Application\ Support/factorio/mods/THPR* && export VERSION=$(cat info.json | jq -r .version) && cp build/THPR_$VERSION.zip ~/Library/Application\ Support/factorio/mods/
